Description: Pottery 'gaming' sherd. Rim sherd from a hemispherical bowl. Black and white painted decoration.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Curator's comments: Originally thought to be of foreign manufacture, but now recognised as a 'gaming-sherd'.
Bibliographic references: Kemp & Merrillees 1980 / Minoan Pottery in Second Millennium Egypt (p. 77)
